content: * be ready to be pretty in pink these easy leg warmers are meant for beginners we will use a basic shell and work in rounds it is a two row repeat pattern for legwarmers no sewing is needed the size can be modified easily these can be worn as yoga socks or ballet socks or slouchy socks boot cuffs are ribbed *skill easy easy beginner tutorial available *sizes one size fits most women length 14 or 36 cm width 5 5 or 14 cm instructions to modify length and width available *material yarn any medium weight/ weight 4 yarn of choice can be used yarn used by me nako vega shade powder 11421 yardage 195 m/ 214 yards in 100 g of yarn each skein has 100 g material 100% premium acrylic amount needed 150 g /321 yards crochet hook 5 mm or an h size hook notions tapestry needle scissors measuring tape gauge measured in double_crochet row- 15 double_crochet and 7 row *pattern details 1 the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english 2 this is a 6 page pdf pattern a print friendly version is available 3 it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern for beginners row by row notes with pictures it does not include finished product 4 it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it *immediately after purchase you will receive a pdf crochet pattern which is a
